mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dv_users ( username, password, name, email, phone, role, user_gender ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{role}, 'hidden' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dv_users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT username FROM dv_users WHERE name = #{name} AND email = #{email}
SELECT member_id, username, name, email, phone, role, user_gender, create_at, withdrawn FROM dv_users WHERE role = #{role} AND withdrawn = 0 ORDER BY member_id
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_coupons WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND coupon_id = #{coupon_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_coupons (member_id, coupon_id, received_at, expired_at) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{coupon_id}, #{received_at}, #{expired_at})
mapper.select: SELECT uc.*, c.description, c.discount FROM user_coupons uc JOIN coupons c ON uc.coupon_id = c.coupon_id WHERE uc.member_id = #{memberId}
